responsabilities.text: Built a booking system using React, Typescript, Redux and Tailwind CSS.
Implemented custom hooks to provide reusable and efficient solutions.
Developed a backend architecture and implemented user authentication as well as role-based access control.
Implemented serverless functions, such as Lambda functions.
Increased website performance and loading times due to optimization techniques such as lazy loading, resulting in reduced bounce rates and improved user engagement.
Collaborated closely with diverse clients, addressing their needs and objectives effectively.
Actively listened to client feedback, incorporating valuable insights into my design process.
Employed a client-centric approach, achieving higher client satisfaction through tailored designs.
